Html: I noticed the use of markitup! in the source code checkins.  Uber cool.  I love that thing.  That is going to be smokin.

Glad you like :)

Some (most?) folks will probably want a WYSIWYG but personally this is perfect for what I'd need. That, and I haven't come across an awesome Ms-PL -friendly jQuery WYSIWYG editor :)
Yah, we're just trying to get something other than a text area in there.  We will do our best to make it so someone could easily write a plugin to include a WYSIWYG editor instead if they want.
